ModMetaData.name: Call of Cthulhu - Elder Things Tweak (Continued)
ModMetaData.author: Cruril Stormrunner
ModMetaData.description:
[img]https://i.imgur.com/buuPQel.png[/img] Update of Cruril Stormrunners mod https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1679102896
- Replaced the overwrite with patches instead - Laser guns should now have mass of 30 kg instead so Elders can take them on caravans. Via Duke of Chutney.
[img]https://i.imgur.com/pufA0kM.png[/img]

[img]https://i.imgur.com/Z4GOv8H.png[/img] Allows Elder Thing race to use other weapons besides Elder Thing Laser Gun. Increases lifespan by 10-fold.
Credit to Jecrell for the original mod, my mod is just a tweak off of theirs!
[img]https://i.imgur.com/PwoNOj4.png[/img] [list] [*] See if the the error persists if you just have this mod and its requirements active.
